name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Roy Tang  To be fair, most influencers right now have a bad rap of concealing that they were paid advertisers. I was admittedly going for that, but that's probably a case of bad execution more than bad intent. Doing work that favors a campaign isn't bad so long as you aren't breaking the law.
